subject: Re: [junit] Generating Reports
msgSnippet: ... Yes, and you could have found that answer much more quickly with Google. I hope that helps you with your next question. You want the Ant task
messageBody:
Prasad wrote:
> Hi Everybody,
>
> Can we generate test result reports(text or html) using junit ?

Yes, and you could have found that answer much more quickly with Google.
I hope that helps you with your next question.

You want the Ant task <junit-report>.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
